league,54,18,1	script	สุ่มคอสตูมสาขา2	4_STAR_BOX_CRT1,{

set .require_item,677;
set .require_amount,20;

setarray .itemcostume[0],5977,5979,19424,19433,19459,19500,19503,19505,19513,19514,19528,19531,19534,19541,19552,19553,19554,19556,19562,19563,19564,19566,19567,19580,19584,19604,19605,19606,19610,19615,19634,19636,19638,19651,19672,19683,19689,19713,19725,19726,19732,19736,19743,19746,19747,19764,19770,19783,19785,19791,19792,19793,19794,19798,19801,19805,19817,19821,19849,19850,19875,19881,19882,19902,19905,19918,19919,19920,19922,19924,19938,19940,19947,19951,19952,19981,19992,19993,19996,20015,20022,20029,20030,20034,20035,20043,20054,20059,20061,20071,20091,20102,20107,20126,20132,20143,20150,20152,20156,20162,20163,20166,20169,20176,20192,20193,20195,20201,20202,20206,20210,20211,20223,20230,20234,20235,20239,20240,20259,20264,20279,20280,20285,20291,20299,20300,20305,20307,20313,20315,20323,20326,20328,20340,20341,20342,20344,20349,20350,20351,20352,20353,20354,20355,20356,20357,20358,20359,20360,20361,20362,20363,20364,20365,20366,20367,20368,20369,20370,20391,20397,20400,20405,20407,20416,20417,20418,20419,20420,20421,20422,20423,20424,20425,20426,20427,20428,20429,20438,20440,20441,20448,20457,20462,20468,20481,20487,20497,20522,20798,21202,21206,21207,31029,31030,31033,31045,31052,31055,31057,31063,31064,31065,31066,31067,31068,31069,31070,31071,31072,31073,31074,31075,31076,31077,31078,31079,31080,31081,31082,31083,31084,31085,31086,31087,31088,31093,31117,31118,31121,31129,31134,31142,31152,31162,31164,31172,31178,31181,31189,31199,31207,31208,31209,31210,31211,31212,31213,31214,31215,31216,31217,31218,31219,31220,31221,31222,31223,31224,31225,31226,31227,31228,31229,31230,31231,31232,31233,31237,31241,31251,31254,31256,31257,31261,31264,31289,31292,31296,31300,31304,31305,31311,31315,31316,31319,31325,31330,31358,31360,31374,31377,31381,31383,31386,31393,31395,31404,31409,31418,31421,31422,31423,31424,31425,31426,31427,31428,31429,31432,31438,31446,31450,31453,31454,31455,31458,31460,31469,31470,31473,31474,31477,31478,31479,31482,31490,31492,31493,31498,31500, 	// callshop "dig_shop1", 1;
	//npcshopattach "dig_shop1";
	mes "[ สุ่มคอสตูมสาขา2 ]"; 

	if(countitem(.require_item)  < .require_amount){
		mes "เสียใจด้วยคุณไม่มี "+getitemname(.require_item);
		mes "ต้องการใช้ จำนวน "+.require_amount+" ชิ้น";
		close;
	}
	
  
	mes "ราคาสำหรับสุ่มคอสตูมคือ "+.require_amount+" / ชิ้น ";
 

	Next;


	
   switch(select("สุ่มคอสตูม  : ยังไม่ต้องการ , Thanks.")) {
	case 1:
   set .rec_item,.itemcostume[rand(0,getarraysize(.itemcostume))] ;
 
   
   getitem .rec_item,1;
    

   announce "[ระบบ] ขณะนี้ คุณ [ "+strcharinfo(0)+" ] ได้รับไอเทม  "+ getitemname(.rec_item)+" จากการสุ่ม   สุ่มคอสตูมสาขา2  แล้วจ้า ",0,0xd68910 ;
	mes "[ สุ่มคอสตูมสาขา2 ]"; 
	mes "ขอแสดงความยินดี คุณได้รับไอเทม ";
	mes getitemname(.rec_item)+"จำนวน 1 ชิ้น";
	delitem .require_item,.require_amount;
	specialeffect2 154;
	soundeffect "phantom_child_die2.wav",1;
	deletearray .itemcostume,getarraysize(.itemcostume);
	close;
	break;
	
	case 2:
		mes "[ สุ่มคอสตูมสาขา2 ]"; 
		mes "Ok, Thank You.";
		close;
		
	break;
	
	}
   
   
end;
OnInit:
	
 
	set .message$,"สุ่มคอสตูมสาขา2 ";
	while(1)
	{
	
	 delwaitingroom;
	
	 waitingroom .message$,0;
	 
	 sleep 650;

	}	





	end;
	
	
}
